citations.narrative:
No acquisition records of the six African dormice (both males and females present) were available for review at time of
inspection. Missing required documentation impedes the inspection process and oversight of inspectors to ensure animal
welfare. Every dealer shall make, keep, and maintain records which fully and correctly disclose purchases and
acquisitions of regulated animals.
Correct by making and maintaining acquisition records for regulated animals in licensee's possession by 12 June 2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with licensee.
n

narrative:
2.75(b)(1) 
   
Records: Dealers and exhibitors. 
No acquisition records of the six African dormice (both males and females present) were available for review at time of 
inspection.  Missing required documentation impedes the inspection process and oversight of inspectors to ensure animal 
welfare.  Every dealer shall make, keep, and maintain records which fully and correctly disclose purchases and 
acquisitions of regulated animals. 
 
Correct by making and maintaining acquisition records for regulated animals in licensee's possession by 12 June 2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with licensee.
